name: Ultimate Primewire dark reskin
description:
A complete site reskin, dark background, all different fonts, all images have box shadow, all fonts text shadow. About 99% complete, but will be updating it regularly for a while so if you find incomplete areas, should get patched soon enough. 

only tested on Firefox sofar
additional_info: a few more screenshots: Tv episodes - Forums - Playlists and if your a member and like the script, welcome some karma points or gift an image on my profile page here The skins intentionally low contrast, best suited to darker room lighting, but can tweak it to show a silver background for brighter lighting, it looks better dark, but the silver backgrounds a decent workaround: just change the html background color on line 12 from .7 to 0 about the chatbox feature, am unable to make the background transparent, so it doesnt match the rest of the skin, have tried to blend it in best as possible fwiw, the script layouts pretty disorganized without clear groupings of site areas, so dont expect to find it simple editing, i will rewrite it later with better grouped sections but'll be a bit of a project also, you can get the transparent tooltips shown in the screenshots here, might also wanto try one of my scrollbar scripts, you dont see any in those screenshots cause i use the autohiding version
